data.Name: Karen Zimbrich
data.staff_bio: Karen has worked as a classroom teacher, a vocational program director, and a secondary transition specialist in Dane Co. WI, Washington DC, Cape Town South Africa, and Newton MA. She worked at Lesley University as Associate Director of the Center for Special Education in between stints at the ICI, where she worked on the Education and Transition Team for 15 years. Karen currently works on the Research Team as a Knowledge Translation Program Director.
data.staff_ed:
B.S., Behavioral Disabilities, University of Wisconsin
M.Ed., Deaf/Blind/Multiple Disabilities, Boston College

In Going to College: Expanding opportunities for people with disabilities. Paul H. Brookes Publishing Co. Baltimore, MD.
